results.name: amount_in_home_currency
results.label: Amount in company currency
results.description: The amount of the deal, using the exchange rate, in your company's currency
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(string(deal_currency_code)) then if bool(hs_is_closed) then (amount * dated_exchange_rate(string(deal_currency_code), if is_present(string(closedate)) then string(closedate) else timestamp(hs_is_closed))) else (amount * exchange_rate(string(deal_currency_code))) else amount

results.name: days_to_close
results.label: Days to close
results.description: The number of days the deal took to close
results.calculationFormula: max(0, round_down(((closedate - createdate) / 86400000), 0))

results.name: deal_currency_code
results.label: Currency
results.description: Currency code for the deal.

results.name: hs_acv
results.label: Annual contract value
results.description: The annual contract value (ACV) of this deal.

results.name: hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids
results.label: Business units
results.description: The business units this record is assigned to.

results.name: hs_all_collaborator_owner_ids
results.label: Deal Collaborator
results.description: Owner ids of the users involved in closing the deal

results.name: hs_all_deal_split_owner_ids
results.label: Deal Split Users
results.description: The owner ids of all associated Deal Splits. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source
results.label: Latest Source
results.description: Source for the contact either directly or indirectly associated with the last session activity for this deal
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(string(hs_analytics_latest_source_contact)) then string(hs_analytics_latest_source_contact) else string(hs_analytics_latest_source_company)

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_company
results.label: Latest Source Company
results.description: Source for the company with an associated contact with the last session activity for this deal

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_contact
results.label: Latest Source Contact
results.description: Source for the directly associated contact with the last session activity for this deal

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1
results.label: Latest Source Data 1
results.description: Additional source details of the last session attributed to any contacts that are directly or indirectly associated with this deal
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(string(hs_analytics_latest_source_contact)) then string(hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1_contact) else string(hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1_company)

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1_company
results.label: Latest Source Data 1 Company
results.description: Additional source details of the last session attributed to any contacts that are indirectly associated with this deal (via a company association)

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1_contact
results.label: Latest Source Data 1 Contact
results.description: Additional source details of the last session attributed to any contacts that are directly associated with this deal

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2
results.label: Latest Source Data 2
results.description: Additional source details of the last session attributed to any contacts that are directly or indirectly associated with this deal
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(string(hs_analytics_latest_source_contact)) then string(hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2_contact) else string(hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2_company)

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2_company
results.label: Latest Source Data 2 Company
results.description: Additional source details of the last session attributed to any contacts that are indirectly associated with this deal

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2_contact
results.label: Latest Source Data 2 Contact
results.description: Additional source details of the last session attributed to any contacts that are directly associated with this deal

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp
results.label: Latest Source Timestamp
results.description: Timestamp of when latest source occurred for either a directly or indirectly associated contact
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(string(hs_analytics_latest_source_contact)) then hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp_contact else hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp_company

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp_company
results.label: Latest Source Timestamp Company
results.description: Timestamp of when latest source occurred for an indirectly associated contact

results.name: hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp_contact
results.label: Latest Source Timestamp Contact
results.description: Timestamp of when latest source occurred for a directly associated contact

results.name: hs_analytics_source
results.label: Original Source Type
results.description: Original source for the contact with the earliest activity for this deal.

results.name: hs_analytics_source_data_1
results.label: Original Source Data 1
results.description: Additional information about the original source for the associated contact, or associated company if there is no contact, with the oldest value for the Time first seen property.

results.name: hs_analytics_source_data_2
results.label: Original Source Data 2
results.description: Additional information about the original source for the associated contact, or associated company if there is no contact, with the oldest value for the Time first seen property.

results.name: hs_arr
results.label: Annual recurring revenue
results.description: The annual recurring revenue (ARR) of this deal.

results.name: hs_campaign
results.label: HubSpot Campaign
results.description: The marketing campaign the deal is associated with

results.name: hs_closed_amount
results.label: Closed Deal Amount
results.description: Returns the amount if the deal is closed. Else, returns 0.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(pipeline_probability(string(dealstage))) and pipeline_probability(string(dealstage)) >= 1) then amount else 0

results.name: hs_closed_amount_in_home_currency
results.label: Closed Deal Amount In Home Currency
results.description: Returns the amount in home currency if the deal is closed. Else, returns 0.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(pipeline_probability(string(dealstage))) and pipeline_probability(string(dealstage)) >= 1) then amount_in_home_currency else 0

results.name: hs_closed_won_count
results.label: Closed won count
results.description: Returns 1 if this deal is closed won
results.calculationFormula: if bool(hs_is_closed_won) then 1 endif

results.name: hs_closed_won_date
results.label: Closed Won Date (Internal)
results.description: Returns closedate if this deal is closed won
results.calculationFormula: if bool(hs_is_closed_won) then closedate endif

results.name: hs_created_by_user_id
results.label: Created by user ID
results.description: The user that created this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_date_entered_appointmentscheduled
results.label: Date entered 'Appointment Scheduled (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Appointment Scheduled' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_entered_closedlost
results.label: Date entered 'Closed Lost (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Closed Lost' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_entered_closedwon
results.label: Date entered 'Closed Won (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Closed Won' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_entered_contractsent
results.label: Date entered 'Contract Sent (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Contract Sent' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_entered_decisionmakerboughtin
results.label: Date entered 'Decision Maker Bought-In (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Decision Maker Bought-In' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_entered_presentationscheduled
results.label: Date entered 'Presentation Scheduled (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Presentation Scheduled' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_entered_qualifiedtobuy
results.label: Date entered 'Qualified To Buy (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal entered the 'Qualified To Buy' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_appointmentscheduled
results.label: Date exited 'Appointment Scheduled (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Appointment Scheduled' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_closedlost
results.label: Date exited 'Closed Lost (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Closed Lost' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_closedwon
results.label: Date exited 'Closed Won (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Closed Won' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_contractsent
results.label: Date exited 'Contract Sent (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Contract Sent' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_decisionmakerboughtin
results.label: Date exited 'Decision Maker Bought-In (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Decision Maker Bought-In' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_presentationscheduled
results.label: Date exited 'Presentation Scheduled (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Presentation Scheduled' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_date_exited_qualifiedtobuy
results.label: Date exited 'Qualified To Buy (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The date and time when the deal exited the 'Qualified To Buy' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_deal_amount_calculation_preference
results.label: Deal amount calculation preference
results.description: Specifies how deal amount should be calculated from line items

results.name: hs_deal_stage_probability
results.label: Deal probability
results.description: The probability a deal will close. This defaults to the deal stage probability setting.

results.name: hs_deal_stage_probability_shadow
results.label: Deal stage probability shadow
results.description: Fall back property for calculating the deal stage when no customer override exist.  Probability between 0 and 1 of deal stage. Defaults to 0 for unknown deal stages.
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(pipeline_probability(string(dealstage))) then pipeline_probability(string(dealstage)) else 0

results.name: hs_exchange_rate
results.label: Exchange rate
results.description: This is the exchange rate used to convert the deal amount into your company currency.
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(string(deal_currency_code)) then (amount_in_home_currency / amount) endif

results.name: hs_forecast_amount
results.label: Forecast amount
results.description: The custom forecasted deal value calculated by multiplying the forecast probability and deal amount in your companyâ€™s currency.
results.calculationFormula: if is_present(hs_forecast_probability) then (hs_forecast_probability * amount_in_home_currency) else amount_in_home_currency

results.name: hs_forecast_probability
results.label: Forecast probability
results.description: The custom percent probability a deal will close.

results.name: hs_is_closed
results.label: Is Deal Closed?
results.description: True if the deal was won or lost.
results.calculationFormula: (pipeline_probability(string(dealstage)) <= 0 or pipeline_probability(string(dealstage)) >= 1)

results.name: hs_is_closed_won
results.label: Is Closed Won
results.description: True if the deal is in the closed won state, false otherwise
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(pipeline_probability(string(dealstage))) and pipeline_probability(string(dealstage)) >= 1) then true else false

results.name: hs_is_deal_split
results.label: Deal Split Added
results.description: Indicates if the deal is split between multiple users.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(hs_num_associated_deal_splits) and hs_num_associated_deal_splits > 1) then true else false

results.name: hs_lastmodifieddate
results.label: Last Modified Date
results.description: Most recent timestamp of any property update for this deal. This includes HubSpot internal properties, which can be visible or hidden. This property is updated automatically.

results.name: hs_likelihood_to_close
results.label: Likelihood to close by the close date
results.description: Hubspot predicted likelihood between 0 and 1 of the deal to close by the close date.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_hs_discount_percentage
results.label: Global Term Line Item Discount Percentage
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Global term for the discount percentage applied.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_hs_discount_percentage_enabled
results.label: Global Term Line Item Discount Percentage Enabled
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Indicates if the Global term for the discount percentage is enabled.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_hs_recurring_billing_period
results.label: Global Term Line Item Recurring Billing Period
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Global term for product recurring billing duration.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_hs_recurring_billing_period_enabled
results.label: Global Term Line Item Recurring Billing Period Enabled
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Indicates if the Global term for product recurring billing duration is enabled.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_hs_recurring_billing_start_date
results.label: Global Term Line Item Recurring Billing Start Date
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Global term for recurring billing start date for a line item.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_hs_recurring_billing_start_date_enabled
results.label: Global Term Line Item Recurring Billing Start Date Enabled
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Indicates if the Global term for recurring billing start date for a line item is enabled.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_recurringbillingfrequency
results.label: Global Term Line Item Recurring Billing Frequency
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Global term for how frequently the product is billed.

results.name: hs_line_item_global_term_recurringbillingfrequency_enabled
results.label: Global Term Line Item Recurring Billing Frequency Enabled
results.description: For internal HubSpot Application use only. Indicates if the Global term for how frequently the product is billed is enabled

results.name: hs_manual_forecast_category
results.label: Forecast category
results.description: The likelihood a deal will close. This property is used for manual forecasting your deals.

results.name: hs_merged_object_ids
results.label: Merged Deal IDs
results.description: The list of Deal record IDs that have been merged into this Deal. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_mrr
results.label: Monthly recurring revenue
results.description: The monthly recurring revenue (MRR) of this deal.

results.name: hs_next_step
results.label: Next step
results.description: A short description of the next step for the deal

results.name: hs_num_associated_active_deal_registrations
results.label: Number of Active Deal Registrations
results.description: The number of active deal registrations associated with this deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_num_associated_deal_registrations
results.label: Number of Deal Registrations
results.description: The number of deal registrations associated with this deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_num_associated_deal_splits
results.label: Number of Deal Splits
results.description: The number of deal splits associated with this deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_num_of_associated_line_items
results.label: Number of Associated Line Items
results.description: The number of line items associated with this deal

results.name: hs_num_target_accounts
results.label: Number of target accounts
results.description: The number of target account companies associated with this deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_object_id
results.label: Record ID
results.description: The unique ID for this record. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_pinned_engagement_id
results.label: Pinned Engagement ID
results.description: The object ID of the current pinned engagement. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_predicted_amount
results.label: The predicted deal amount
results.description: Returns the multiplication of the deal amount times the predicted likelihood of the deal to close by the close date.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(hs_likelihood_to_close) and hs_likelihood_to_close >= 0 and hs_likelihood_to_close <= 1 and is_present(amount)) then (hs_likelihood_to_close * amount) else ''

results.name: hs_predicted_amount_in_home_currency
results.label: The predicted deal amount in your company's currency
results.description: Returns the multiplication of the deal amount in your company's currency times the predicted likelihood of the deal to close by the close date.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(hs_likelihood_to_close) and hs_likelihood_to_close >= 0 and hs_likelihood_to_close <= 1 and is_present(amount_in_home_currency)) then (hs_likelihood_to_close * amount_in_home_currency) else ''

results.name: hs_projected_amount
results.label: Weighted amount
results.description: Returns the multiplication of the amount times the probability of the deal closing.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(hs_deal_stage_probability) and hs_deal_stage_probability >= 0) then (hs_deal_stage_probability * amount) else 0

results.name: hs_projected_amount_in_home_currency
results.label: Weighted amount in company currency
results.description: Returns the multiplication of the amount in home currency times the probability of the deal closing.
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(hs_deal_stage_probability) and hs_deal_stage_probability >= 0) then (hs_deal_stage_probability * amount_in_home_currency) else 0

results.name: hs_read_only
results.label: Read Only Object
results.description: Is the object read only

results.name: hs_source_object_id
results.label: Source Object ID
results.description: The ID of the object from which the data was migrated. This is set automatically during portal data migration.

results.name: hs_tag_ids
results.label: Deal Tags
results.description: List of tag ids applicable to a deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_tcv
results.label: Total contract value
results.description: The total contract value (TCV) of this deal.

results.label: Time in 'Appointment Scheduled (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Appointment Scheduled' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_time_in_closedlost
results.label: Time in 'Closed Lost (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Closed Lost' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_time_in_closedwon
results.label: Time in 'Closed Won (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Closed Won' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_time_in_contractsent
results.label: Time in 'Contract Sent (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Contract Sent' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_time_in_decisionmakerboughtin
results.label: Time in 'Decision Maker Bought-In (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Decision Maker Bought-In' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_time_in_presentationscheduled
results.label: Time in 'Presentation Scheduled (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Presentation Scheduled' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_time_in_qualifiedtobuy
results.label: Time in 'Qualified To Buy (Sales Pipeline)'
results.description: The total time in seconds spent by the deal in the 'Qualified To Buy' stage, 'Sales Pipeline' pipeline

results.name: hs_unique_creation_key
results.label: Unique creation key
results.description: Unique property used for idempotent creates

results.name: hs_updated_by_user_id
results.label: Updated by user ID
results.description: The user that last updated this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_followers
results.label: User IDs of all notification followers
results.description: The user IDs of all users that have clicked follow within the object to opt-in to getting follow notifications

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_unfollowers
results.label: User IDs of all notification unfollowers
results.description: The user IDs of all object owners that have clicked unfollow within the object to opt-out of getting follow notifications

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_owners
results.label: User IDs of all owners
results.description: The user IDs of all owners of this object

results.name: hs_was_imported
results.label: Performed in an import
results.description: Object is part of an import

results.name: hubspot_owner_assigneddate
results.label: Owner Assigned Date
results.description: The date the most recent deal owner was assigned to a deal. This is updated automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: dealname
results.label: Deal Name
results.description: The name given to this deal.

results.name: amount
results.label: Amount
results.description: The total amount of the deal

results.name: dealstage
results.label: Deal Stage
results.description: The stage of the deal. Deal stages allow you to categorize and track the progress of the deals that you are working on.

results.name: pipeline
results.label: Pipeline
results.description: The pipeline the deal is in. This determines which stages are options for the deal.

results.name: closedate
results.label: Close Date
results.description: Date the deal was closed. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: createdate
results.label: Create Date
results.description: Date the deal was created. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked
results.label: Date of last meeting booked in meetings tool
results.description: The date of the most recent meeting an associated contact has booked through the meetings tool.

results.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign
results.label: Campaign of last booking in meetings tool
results.description: This UTM parameter shows which marketing campaign (e.g. a specific email) referred an associated contact to the meetings tool for their most recent booking. This property is only populated when you add tracking parameters to your meeting link.

results.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium
results.label: Medium of last booking in meetings tool
results.description: This UTM parameter shows which channel (e.g. email) referred an associated contact to the meetings tool for their most recent booking. This property is only populated when you add tracking parameters to your meeting link.

results.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked_source
results.label: Source of last booking in meetings tool
results.description: This UTM parameter shows which site (e.g. Twitter) referred an associated contact to the meetings tool for their most recent booking. This property is only populated when you add tracking parameters to your meeting link.

results.name: hs_latest_meeting_activity
results.label: Latest meeting activity
results.description: The date of the most recent meeting (past or upcoming) logged for, scheduled with, or booked by a contact associated with this deal.

results.name: hs_sales_email_last_replied
results.label: Recent Sales Email Replied Date
results.description: The last time a tracked sales email was replied to for this deal

results.name: hubspot_owner_id
results.label: Deal owner
results.description: User the deal is assigned to. Assign additional users to a deal record by creating a custom user property.

results.name: notes_last_contacted
results.label: Last Contacted
results.description: The last time a call, sales email, or meeting was logged for this deal. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions.

results.name: notes_last_updated
results.label: Last Activity Date
results.description: The last time a note, call, email, meeting, or task was logged for a deal. This is updated automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: notes_next_activity_date
results.label: Next Activity Date
results.description: The date of the next upcoming activity for a deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot based on user action. This includes logging a future call, sales email, or meeting using the Log feature, as well as creating a future task or scheduling a future meeting. This is updated automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: num_contacted_notes
results.label: Number of times contacted
results.description: The total number of sales activities (notes, calls, emails, meetings, or tasks) logged for a deal. This is updated automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: num_notes
results.label: Number of Sales Activities
results.description: The total number of times a sales email or call has been logged for a deal. This is updated automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hs_createdate
results.label: HubSpot Create Date
results.description: The date the deal was created. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: hubspot_team_id
results.label: HubSpot Team
results.description: Primary team of the deal owner. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: dealtype
results.label: Deal Type
results.description: The type of deal. By default, categorize your deal as either a New Business or Existing Business.

results.name: hs_all_owner_ids
results.label: All owner ids
results.description: The value of all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom

results.name: description
results.label: Deal Description
results.description: Description of the deal

results.name: hs_all_team_ids
results.label: All team ids
results.description: The team ids corresponding to all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom

results.name: hs_all_accessible_team_ids
results.label: All accessible team ids
results.description: The team ids, including up the team hierarchy, corresponding to all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom

results.name: num_associated_contacts
results.label: Number of Associated Contacts
results.description: The number of contacts associated with this deal. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

results.name: closed_lost_reason
results.label: Closed Lost Reason
results.description: Reason why this deal was lost

results.name: closed_won_reason
results.label: Closed Won Reason
results.description: Reason why this deal was won
